org.globalplatform.broker

Interface CDCVMBrokerCallbackRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BrokerCallbackRequest, javacard.framework.Shareable

    public interface CDCVMBrokerCallbackRequest
extends BrokerCallbackRequest
    Extension of the BrokerCallbackRequest interface including definitions specific to the CDCVM (Consumer Device CVM) use case.

    It is intended for objects implementing this interface to be accessed through a Global Service registered by a Broker Application with service identifier SERVICE_BROKER_CDCVM.

    When invoking this interface, in order to form a valid parameter value the caller shall:

    • For BrokerCallbackRequest.requestCallback(short, short, short):
      • For the object parameter, use the encoding rules described for the BrokerListener.onBrokerEvent(short, short, short, short, short, short, short, short, short) for that same parameter. However, the value 'FFFF' does not apply.
      • For the attributes parameter, the value is RFU (i.e. use '0000').
      • For the request parameter, use any of the REQUEST_CDCVM_XXX constants defined by this interface.

    E.g. 

       broker.requestCallback(OBJECT_CDCVM_BIO_FINGER_DEFAULT,(short)0x0000,REQUEST_CDCVM_LAST_EVENT);
    Since:
    • export file version 1.0: initial version.
    • export file version 1.1: new constant REQUEST_CDCVM_FRESH_VERIFICATION_RESULT

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static short REQUEST_CDCVM_FRESH_VERIFICATION_RESULT
      Constant used to request the Broker Application notifying a fresh CDCVM verification result (of specified CDCVM object) that hasn't been notified yet to the caller Application.
      static short REQUEST_CDCVM_LAST_EVENT
      Constant used to request the Broker Application sending back the last CDCVM event (pertaining to specified CDCVM object).
      static short REQUEST_CDCVM_NEW_VERIFICATION
      Constant used to request the Broker Application initiating a procedure to have the Host Device (or a Host Device Application) trigger a new CDCVM verification attempt (of specified CDCVM object) and produce a new verification result.
      static short REQUEST_CDCVM_NOTIFY_VERIFICATION_CONSUMED
      Constant used to notify the Broker Application that the caller Application has consumed the last notified successful verification result (pertaining to specified CDCVM object).
      static short SERVICE_BROKER_CDCVM
      Constant used to register and retrieve the Global Service implementing this interface (FAMILY_BROKER_SERVICE<<8|0x01).

      • Fields inherited from interface org.globalplatform.broker.BrokerCallbackRequest

        FAMILY_BROKER_SERVICE

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.globalplatform.broker.BrokerCallbackRequest

        requestCallback

    • Field Detail

      • SERVICE_BROKER_CDCVM

        static final short SERVICE_BROKER_CDCVM
        Constant used to register and retrieve the Global Service implementing this interface (FAMILY_BROKER_SERVICE<<8|0x01).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REQUEST_CDCVM_LAST_EVENT

        static final short REQUEST_CDCVM_LAST_EVENT
        Constant used to request the Broker Application sending back the last CDCVM event (pertaining to specified CDCVM object).

        When receiving this request, the Broker Application shall immediately try to notify the caller Application (i.e. before returning from the call made by the Application to the BrokerCallbackRequest.requestCallback(short, short, short) method).

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REQUEST_CDCVM_NEW_VERIFICATION

        static final short REQUEST_CDCVM_NEW_VERIFICATION
        Constant used to request the Broker Application initiating a procedure to have the Host Device (or a Host Device Application) trigger a new CDCVM verification attempt (of specified CDCVM object) and produce a new verification result.

        This kind of request shall be used when an Application wishes to trigger a new CDCVM verification attempt. However, such a request may not be supported by all implementations. If supported, the Broker Application provides no guarantee as to when the fresh result will be notified.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REQUEST_CDCVM_NOTIFY_VERIFICATION_CONSUMED

        static final short REQUEST_CDCVM_NOTIFY_VERIFICATION_CONSUMED
        Constant used to notify the Broker Application that the caller Application has consumed the last notified successful verification result (pertaining to specified CDCVM object).

        This notification may be used by an Application that consumed a successful verification result (i.e. as part of a particular transaction) and wishes to inform the Broker Application.

        The interpretation of this notification by the Broker Application is implementation/policy dependent. If the successful verification result referenced by the caller Application (i.e. for the specified CDCVM object) is obsolete or unknown to the Broker Application, then the notification may be silently ignored.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REQUEST_CDCVM_FRESH_VERIFICATION_RESULT

        static final short REQUEST_CDCVM_FRESH_VERIFICATION_RESULT
        Constant used to request the Broker Application notifying a fresh CDCVM verification result (of specified CDCVM object) that hasn't been notified yet to the caller Application.

        This kind of request shall be used when an Application wishes to be notified of a fresh CDCVM verification result, if such a result is available, but neither wants to trigger any new verification attempt nor wants to wait for a pending verification result.

        In response to this request, the Broker Application may notify one of the following events:

        • CDCVMBrokerListener.EVENT_CDCVM_EVENT_NOT_PERFORMED
        • CDCVMBrokerListener.EVENT_CDCVM_EVENT_VERIFICATION_SUCCEEDED
        • CDCVMBrokerListener.EVENT_CDCVM_EVENT_VERIFICATION_FAILED
        Since:
        export file 1.1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
